exclusion:
Set your Z-Wave controller into unpair mode.

Triple-click the tamper switch on Door / Window Sensor 7 within 1.5 seconds - this will cause the LED to blink five times.

After a successful exclusion, it will light up its LED for 2 seconds then deactivate.
inclusion:
Set your Z-Wave controller into pairing mode.

Triple-click the tamper switch on Door / Window Sensor 7 - this begins to blink five times

After completion of the inclusion, it lights up once before it goes out.

Close the cover

Note: Closing the cover is important! If the housing is not closed, the sensor is permanently awake. Only when the cover is closed does the sensor change to the idle state.
label: ZWA012
overview: Aeotec Door / Window Sensor 7 was developed to record the condition of doors or windows with Z-Wave Plus. It is powered by Aeotec’s Gen7 technology and S2 framework. This Pro version adds options for a tilt sensor and terminals for use as a dry contact sensor.
wakeup:
Wake up the device by removing the cover.

Then hit the tamper switch once.

parameters.label: Operation Mode
parameters.overview: This parameter allows switching between internal sensor and external sensor.

parameters.label: Dry Contact Operation Mode
parameters.overview: Parameter defines how dry contact will operate with the sensor or switch that is connected to the dry contact terminals.

options.label: NO Toggle / Follow state will follow the input of the dry contact term
NC Toggle / Follow state will follow the input of the dry contact term
NO save state will allow state of sensor to toggle OPEN/CLOSE based on
NC save state will allow state of sensor to toggle OPEN/CLOSE based on

parameters.label: Door/Window State
parameters.description: Sensor state when the magnet is close to the sensor
parameters.overview: This parameter allows setting Door / Window Sensor 7 state when the magnet is close to the sensor.

parameters.label: LED
parameters.description: Defines when the LED will indicate events
parameters.overview:
This parameter defines events indicated by the visual LED indicator. Disabling events might extend battery life.

Can be summed, e.g. a setting of 6 will disable open/close but enable wake up and tamper.

options.label: Indicate open and close status change

parameters.label: Range Test
parameters.overview: Allows enabling the activation of Z-Wave range test with double click of a Tamper Switch 2.

parameters.label: Group 2 Association Triggers
parameters.description: Defines events that result in sending On/Off commands to devices added to the 2nd Association Group
parameters.overview: This parameter defines events that result in sending On/Off commands to devices added to the 2nd Association Group. These commands are sent alternately to switch the devices On and Off. Commands represent the values of BASIC SET command frames. This parameter is inactive in external dry-contact mode (parameter “Operation Mode” set to 1).

parameters.label: Group 2 Commands
parameters.description: Commands sent to associated devices on Group 2
parameters.overview: Command frames sent to devices added to the 2nd association group.

parameters.label: Group 2 On
parameters.overview: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module, values 0-99 can be sent.

parameters.label: Group 2 Off
parameters.overview: The value of 0 turns OFF the device, 255 turns it On. In the case of associating the Dimmer or Roller Shutter module, values 0-99 can be sent.

parameters.label: Group 2 On Delay
parameters.description: Time delay of On command from Group 2
parameters.overview: The time period after which On command frame will be sent.

parameters.label: Group 2 Off Delay
parameters.description: Time delay of Off command from Group 2
parameters.overview: The time period after which the OFF command frame will be sent.

parameters.label: Tamper Cancellation Delay
parameters.overview: The time period after which a tamper alarm will be canceled.

parameters.label: Tamper Cancellation Reporting
parameters.overview: Reporting cancellation of tamper alarm to the controller and 3rd Association Group.

options.label: Do not send tamper cancellation report

parameters.label: Central Scene
parameters.overview: This parameter enables/disables the central scene function.

parameters.label: Tilt Sensor
parameters.overview: This parameter enables/disables the tilt function.

parameters.label: Tilt Sensor State
parameters.overview: This parameter allows to set the state of the door/window when the tilt is in an OFF state.

parameters.label: Group 5 Association Triggers
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the status of the magnet switch that causes sending a BASIC command to all devices of Association Group 5.

parameters.label: Group 5 Commands
parameters.description: Command sent to devices of Association Group 5
parameters.overview: This parameter defines which commands is sent to 5th Association Group.

parameters.label: Group 5 On
parameters.overview: This is the BASIC command value sent in case of On event. 0 is off, 255 is on or a value between 0-99 can be sent.

parameters.label: Group 5 Off
parameters.overview: This is the BASIC command value sent in case of Off event. 0 is off, 255 is on or a value between 0-99 can be sent.

parameters.label: Tilt Sensitivity
parameters.overview: This parameter adjusts the tilt sensitivity if the tilt is too low or too strong. Value 0 does not disable Tilt Sensor, it just sets it to a minimum.

parameters.label: Factory Reset
parameters.overview: This parameter helps reset configuration parameters and the device to factory defaults.

associations.label: Magnet or Dry Contact
associations.overview: Control devices when a magnet or external dry contact trips

associations.label: Magnet or Dry Contact Alarm
associations.overview: Sends our alarm message when magnet controlled or external dry sensor trips.

associations.label: Tamper Alarm
associations.overview: Sends alarm messages when tamper is tripped

associations.label: Tilt Sensor
associations.overview: Control devices when tilt sensor is tripped
